import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import AppSidebar from "../../Components/Sidebars/AppSidebar"; import CampaignsSidebar from "../../Components/Sidebars/CampaignSidebar"; import AppTopbar from "../../Components/Topbars/AppTopbar"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { GlobalContext } from "../../GlobalProvider"; function CampaignsHome() { let navigate = useNavigate() const {addProspect, selectedCampaign, updateCampaign} = useContext(GlobalContext) const [add, setAdd] = addProspect const [showCampaigns, setShowCampaigns] = useState([]) const [menu, setMenu] = useState(false) const [modal, setModal] = updateCampaign const [campaignId, setCampaignId] = selectedCampaign return(
{/* {add===true ? : console.log('null')} */} {/* {modal ? : null} */}

My Campaigns

{showCampaigns.map((d, index) => )}
Status Name Scheduled Today Prospects Completed

Not Started

None

{d.prospectCount}

-
{setCampaignId(d.id); setModal(!modal)}}>Edit Campaign Name
Start

) } export default CampaignsHome;
